Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local debris =game:GetService("Debris") local keyDown = nil
local gui = nil local selection = 1 local down = false local positions = {UDim2.new(0, 25, 1, -150),UDim2.new(0, 25, 1, -100),UDim2.new(0, 25, 1, -50)}
local iceVaporStream = false local iceVaporRing = false
local humanoid = nil local torso = nil local head = nil
local wallWidth = 60 local wallHeight = 25 local brickSpeed = 0.01
local brickWidth = 6 local brickHeight = 4 local brickDepth = 2
local iceVaporStreamAnim = nil local iceVaporRingAnim = nil local iceVaporWallAnim = nil
local shieldSound = Instance.new("Sound") shieldSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=32788850" shieldSound.Parent = Tool.Handle
local stormSound = Instance.new("Sound") stormSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=32788951" stormSound.Parent = Tool.Handle
local burnSound = Instance.new("Sound") burnSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=32788904" burnSound.Parent = Tool.Handle
local iceVapor = Instance.new("Part") iceVapor.Name = "IceVapor" iceVapor.Transparency = 1 iceVapor.CanCollide = false iceVapor.Anchored = false iceVapor.Shape = 0 iceVapor.formFactor = 0 iceVapor.Size = Vector3.new(7,7,7)
local iceVaporParticles = Instance.new("Fire") iceVaporParticles.Parent = iceVapor iceVaporParticles.Color = Color3.new(51/255,154/255,1) iceVaporParticles.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(0,0,112/255) iceVaporParticles.Heat = -7 iceVaporParticles.Size = 10
local script = Tool.IceScript:clone() script.Parent = iceVapor
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
iceVapor.Name = Tool.Parent.Name .. " iceVapor" keyDown = mouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) buttonDown = mouse.Button1Down:connect(onActivated)
humanoid = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") torso = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") head = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Head")
gui = Tool.IceStaffGui:clone() gui.Parent = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent).PlayerGui
iceVaporStreamAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.firecast) iceVaporRingAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.firering) iceVaporWallAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.firewall)
if Tool.Reload.Value > 0 then reloadTime(Tool.Reload.Value) end
end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)
function onUnequippedLocal()
if keyDown then keyDown:disconnect() end if gui then gui:remove() end gui = nil selection = 1
if iceVaporStreamAnim then iceVaporStreamAnim:Stop() iceVaporStreamAnim:remove() iceVaporStreamAnim = nil end
if iceVaporRingAnim then iceVaporRingAnim:Stop() iceVaporRingAnim:remove() iceVaporRingAnim = nil end
if iceVaporWallAnim then iceVaporWallAnim:Stop() iceVaporWallAnim:remove() iceVaporWallAnim = nil end
head.Anchored = false end
Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
local smoothness = 15 local barSize = 160 local reloading = false function reloadTime(time) reloading = true
gui.ReloadText.ReloadBar.Size = UDim2.new(0,25,0,0) gui.ReloadText.ReloadBar.Position = UDim2.new(0,0,0,160) gui.ReloadText.Visible = true local step = barSize/time local smallStep = step/smoothness Tool.Reload.Value = time for i = 1, time do if gui == nil then return end local size = gui.ReloadText.ReloadBar.Size.Y.Offset local pos = gui.ReloadText.ReloadBar.Position.Y.Offset for j = 1, smoothness do if gui == nil then return end size = size + smallStep pos = pos - smallStep gui.ReloadText.ReloadBar.Size = UDim2.new(0,25,0,size) gui.ReloadText.ReloadBar.Position = UDim2.new(0,0,0,pos) if gui.ReloadText.ReloadBar.Position.Y.Offset < 0 then break end wait(1/smoothness) end Tool.Reload.Value = time - i end Tool.Reload.Value = 0 gui.ReloadText.Visible = false reloading = false end
local enabled = false function onActivated()
if enabled or reloading then return end enabled = true
local v = (humanoid.TargetPoint - Tool.Parent.Head.Position).unit
if selection == 1 then iceVaporStreamAnim:Play() burnSound:Play() freezeBurn() reloadTime(8) elseif selection == 2 then iceVaporRingAnim:Play() shieldSound:Play() iceShield() reloadTime(19) elseif selection == 3 then iceVaporWallAnim:Play() stormSound:Play() snowStorm() reloadTime(12) end
enabled = false
end
function freezeBurn()
v = (humanoid.TargetPoint - Tool.Parent.Head.Position).unit local dist = v * i dist = Vector3.new(torso.Position.x + dist.x,torso.Position.y + dist.y,torso.Position.z + dist.z)
local fiery = iceVapor:clone() fiery.Position = dist fiery.Velocity = v * 100
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0,35250,0) force.Parent = fiery
fiery.Parent = game.Workspace fiery.IceScript.Disabled = false debris:AddItem(fiery,10)
end
function snowStorm()
local radius = 50
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local numOfSparks = 16
local increment = (math.pi *2)/numOfSparks
torsoNormal = torso.CFrame.lookVector denom = math.abs(torsoNormal.x) + math.abs(torsoNormal.z) posX = radius * (torsoNormal.x/denom) posZ = radius * (torsoNormal.z/denom) local v = torso.Position local pos = Vector3.new(v.x + posX,v.y, v.z + posZ)
for i = 1, numOfSparks do
local angle = increment * i local ice = iceVapor:clone() ice.Position = pos ice.Parent = game.Workspace local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0,35250,0) force.Parent = ice ice.Velocity = (pos - v).unit * -25 pos = Vector3.new(((pos.x - v.x) * math.cos(angle)) - ((pos.z - v.z) * math.sin(angle)) + v.x, v.y,((pos.x - v.x) * math.sin(angle)) + ((pos.z - v.z) * math.cos(angle)) + v.z) debris:AddItem(ice,4)
end wait(1) freezePlayers(v, radius)
end
function freezePlayers(v, radius)
local players = game.Players:GetChildren() for i = 1, #players do local playerPos = players[i].Character.Torso.Position -- make sure player is on roughly the same plane if playerPos.y < v.y + 5 and playerPos.y > v.y - 5 and players[i].Character ~= torso.Parent then -- check to see if player is within x-z plane range local diff = Vector2.new(playerPos.x - v.x,playerPos.z - v.z) if diff.magnitude <= radius then local freezer = Tool.FreezeScript:clone() freezer.Parent = players[i].Character freezer.Disabled = false end end end
end
function unAnchor() head.Anchored = false end
local shieldTime = 8 function iceShield()
local gyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") gyro.P = 10000 gyro.D = 1000 gyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(gyro.P,gyro.P,gyro.P)
local iceBlock = Tool.IceBlockScript:clone() iceBlock.Parent = Tool.Parent iceBlock.Disabled = false debris:AddItem(iceBlock,shieldTime)
Tool.Parent.Head.Anchored = true
-- bottom local bottom = Instance.new("Part") bottom.Name = "IceShieldBottom" bottom.Shape = 1 bottom.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Pastel Blue") bottom.Material = 1536 bottom.BottomSurface = 0 bottom.TopSurface = 0 bottom.formFactor = 0 bottom.CanCollide = false bottom.Size = Vector3.new(10,1,15) bottom.Position = Vector3.new(torso.Position.x,torso.Position.y - 10,torso.Position.z) bottom.CFrame = torso.CFrame local gOne = gyro:clone() gOne.cframe = bottom.CFrame gOne.Parent = bottom bottom.Touched:connect(function(part) if part.Parent == torso.Parent then wait(1) bottom.CanCollide = true elseif string.find("Fire",part.Name) then part:remove() end end) local bodyPos = Instance.new("BodyPosition") bodyPos.position = Vector3.new(torso.Position.x,torso.Position.y - 2,torso.Position.z) bodyPos.P = 100000 bodyPos.D = 10000 bodyPos.maxForce = Vector3.new(bodyPos.P,bodyPos.P,bodyPos.P) bodyPos.Parent = bottom bottom.Parent = game.Workspace debris:AddItem(bottom,shieldTime)
-- left local sideOne = Instance.new("Part") sideOne.Shape = 1 sideOne.formFactor = 0 sideOne.CanCollide = false sideOne.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Pastel Blue") sideOne.Material = 1536 sideOne.BottomSurface = 0 sideOne.TopSurface = 0 sideOne.Size = Vector3.new(2,9,15) local rightSide = torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi/2,0) sideOne.CFrame = torso.CFrame local gTwo = gyro:clone() gTwo.cframe = sideOne.CFrame gTwo.Parent = sideOne sideOne.Position = Vector3.new(torso.Position.x + (rightSide.lookVector.unit.x * 10),torso.Position.y,torso.Position.z + (rightSide.lookVector.unit.z * 10)) local bp = bodyPos:clone() bp.position = Vector3.new(torso.Position.x + (rightSide.lookVector.unit.x * 5),torso.Position.y,torso.Position.z + (rightSide.lookVector.unit.z * 5)) bp.Parent = sideOne sideOne.Parent = game.Workspace sideOne.Touched:connect(function(part) if part == bottom then wait(1) sideOne.CanCollide = true elseif string.find("Fire",part.Name) then part:remove() end end) debris:AddItem(sideOne,shieldTime)
-- right local sideTwo = Instance.new("Part") sideTwo.Shape = 1 sideTwo.formFactor = 0 sideTwo.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Pastel Blue") sideTwo.Material = 1536 sideTwo.BottomSurface = 0 sideTwo.TopSurface = 0 sideTwo.CanCollide = false sideTwo.Size = Vector3.new(2,9,15) local leftSide = torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0,-math.pi/2,0) sideTwo.CFrame = torso.CFrame local gThree = gyro:clone() gThree.cframe = sideTwo.CFrame gThree.Parent = sideTwo sideTwo.Position = Vector3.new(torso.Position.x + (leftSide.lookVector.unit.x * 10),torso.Position.y,torso.Position.z + (leftSide.lookVector.unit.z * 10)) local bpTwo = bodyPos:clone() bpTwo.position = Vector3.new(torso.Position.x + (leftSide.lookVector.unit.x * 5),torso.Position.y,torso.Position.z + (leftSide.lookVector.unit.z * 5)) bpTwo.Parent = sideTwo sideTwo.Parent = game.Workspace sideTwo.Touched:connect(function(part) if part == bottom then wait(1) sideTwo.CanCollide = true elseif string.find("Fire",part.Name) then part:remove() end end) debris:AddItem(sideTwo,shieldTime)
-- front local frontSide = Instance.new("Part") frontSide.Shape = 1 frontSide.formFactor = 0 frontSide.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Pastel Blue") frontSide.Material = 1536 frontSide.BottomSurface = 0 frontSide.TopSurface = 0 frontSide.CanCollide = false frontSide.Size = Vector3.new(2,8,8) frontSide.CFrame = torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi/2,0) local gFour = gyro:clone() gFour.cframe = frontSide.CFrame gFour.Parent = frontSide frontSide.Position = Vector3.new(torso.Position.x + (torso.CFrame.lookVector.unit.x * 10),torso.Position.y,torso.Position.z + (torso.CFrame.lookVector.unit.z * 10)) local bpThree = bodyPos:clone() bpThree.position = Vector3.new(torso.Position.x + (torso.CFrame.lookVector.unit.x * 5),torso.Position.y,torso.Position.z + (torso.CFrame.lookVector.unit.z * 5)) bpThree.Parent = frontSide frontSide.Parent = game.Workspace frontSide.Touched:connect(function(part) if part == bottom then wait(1) frontSide.CanCollide = true elseif string.find("Fire",part.Name) then part:remove() end end) debris:AddItem(frontSide,shieldTime)
-- back local backSide = Instance.new("Part") backSide.Shape = 1 backSide.formFactor = 0 backSide.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Pastel Blue") backSide.Material = 1536 backSide.BottomSurface = 0 backSide.TopSurface = 0 backSide.CanCollide = false backSide.Size = Vector3.new(2,8,8) backSide.CFrame = torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi/2,0) local gFive = gyro:clone() gFive.cframe = backSide.CFrame gFive.Parent = backSide backSide.Position = Vector3.new(torso.Position.x - (torso.CFrame.lookVector.unit.x * 10),torso.Position.y,torso.Position.z - (torso.CFrame.lookVector.unit.z * 10)) local bpFour = bodyPos:clone() bpFour.position = Vector3.new(torso.Position.x - (torso.CFrame.lookVector.unit.x * 5),torso.Position.y,torso.Position.z - (torso.CFrame.lookVector.unit.z * 5)) bpFour.Parent = backSide backSide.Parent = game.Workspace backSide.Touched:connect(function(part) if part == bottom then wait(1) backSide.CanCollide = true elseif string.find("Fire",part.Name) then part:remove() end end) debris:AddItem(backSide,shieldTime)
-- top local top = Instance.new("Part") top.Name = "IceShieldTop" top.Shape = 1 top.formFactor = 0 top.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Pastel Blue") top.Material = 1536 top.BottomSurface = 0 top.TopSurface = 0 top.Size = Vector3.new(10,1,15) top.CFrame = torso.CFrame local gSix = gyro:clone() gSix.cframe = top.CFrame gSix.Parent = top top.Position = Vector3.new(torso.Position.x,torso.Position.y + 10,torso.Position.z) local bpFour = bodyPos:clone() bpFour.position = Vector3.new(torso.Position.x,torso.Position.y + 5,torso.Position.z ) bpFour.Parent = top top.Parent = game.Workspace debris:AddItem(top,shieldTime)
delay(shieldTime,unAnchor)
end
local keying = false function onKeyDown(key)
if keying then return end
keying = true
key:lower() if key == "f" then selection = selection + 1 if selection == 4 then selection = 1 end down = false select() elseif key == "r" then selection = selection -1 if selection == 0 then selection = 3 end down = true select() end
keying = false
end
local steps = 10 local moving = false function select()
if moving then return end moving = true
local labels = gui:GetChildren() for i = 1, #labels do if labels[i].Name == "ReloadText" then table.remove(labels,i) break end end local diff = {}
if down then for i = 1, #labels do labels[i].Pos.Value = labels[i].Pos.Value + 1 labels[i].ZIndex = 2 if labels[i].Pos.Value == 4 then labels[i].Pos.Value = 1 labels[i].ZIndex = 1 end if labels[i].Pos.Value == 2 then labels[i].ZIndex = 3 end labels[i].Diff.Value = labels[i].Position.Y.Offset - positions[labels[i].Pos.Value].Y.Offset end for j = 1, steps do for i = 1, #labels do labels[i].Position = UDim2.new(labels[i].Position.X.Scale,labels[i].Position.X.Offset,labels[i].Position.Y.Scale,labels[i].Position.Y.Offset - (labels[i].Diff.Value/steps)) if labels[i].Pos.Value == 2 then labels[i].Size = UDim2.new(0,labels[i].Size.X.Offset + 3,0,labels[i].Size.Y.Offset + 1) elseif labels[i].Pos.Value == 3 then labels[i].Size = UDim2.new(0,labels[i].Size.X.Offset - 3,0,labels[i].Size.Y.Offset - 1) end end wait() end else for i = 1, #labels do labels[i].Pos.Value = labels[i].Pos.Value - 1 labels[i].ZIndex = 2 if labels[i].Pos.Value == 0 then labels[i].Pos.Value = 3 labels[i].ZIndex = 1 end if labels[i].Pos.Value == 2 then labels[i].ZIndex = 3 end labels[i].Diff.Value = labels[i].Position.Y.Offset - positions[labels[i].Pos.Value].Y.Offset end for j = 1, steps do for i = 1, #labels do labels[i].Position = UDim2.new(labels[i].Position.X.Scale,labels[i].Position.X.Offset,labels[i].Position.Y.Scale,labels[i].Position.Y.Offset - (labels[i].Diff.Value/steps)) if labels[i].Pos.Value == 2 then labels[i].Size = UDim2.new(0,labels[i].Size.X.Offset + 3,0,labels[i].Size.Y.Offset + 1) elseif labels[i].Pos.Value == 1 then labels[i].Size = UDim2.new(0,labels[i].Size.X.Offset - 3,0,labels[i].Size.Y.Offset - 1) end end wait() end end
moving = false
end

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end
enabled = false mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
wait(.2) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" enabled = true
end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)

local fire = script.Parent local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local ice = Instance.new("Part") ice.Transparency = 0.5 ice.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue") ice.TopSurface = 0 ice.BottomSurface = 0 ice.Reflectance = 0.75 ice.CanCollide = false
local smoke = Instance.new("Smoke") smoke.Size = 1 smoke.RiseVelocity = -1 smoke.Opacity = 0.1 smoke.Parent = ice
function onTouched(part)
if string.find(fire.Name,part.Parent.Name) ~= nil then return end if part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then if part:FindFirstChild(fire.Name) == nil then burn = script.Icer:clone() burn.Parent = part.Parent burn.Disabled = false ice.Size = Vector3.new(part.Size.x + 1,part.Size.y + 1,part.Size.z + 1) ice.Parent = game.Workspace local weld = Instance.new("Weld") weld.Part0 = ice weld.Parent = ice weld.Part1 = part print(part.Name) debris:AddItem(ice,12) end end
end
fire.Touched:connect(onTouched)

local origSpeed = script.Parent.Humanoid.WalkSpeed script.Parent.Humanoid.WalkSpeed = script.Parent.Humanoid.WalkSpeed - 5 for i = 1, 8 do script.Parent.Humanoid:TakeDamage(1.2) wait(1.5) end script.Parent.Humanoid.WalkSpeed = origSpeed script:remove()

local player = script.Parent
local origWalkSpeed = player.Humanoid.WalkSpeed player.Humanoid.WalkSpeed = origWalkSpeed/4
local bodyColors = player:FindFirstChild("Body Colors") bodyColors.Parent = nil
local newBodyColors = Instance.new("BodyColors") newBodyColors.HeadColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue") newBodyColors.LeftArmColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue") newBodyColors.RightArmColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue") newBodyColors.RightLegColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue") newBodyColors.LeftLegColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue") newBodyColors.TorsoColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue") newBodyColors.Parent = player
wait(15)
player.Humanoid.WalkSpeed = origWalkSpeed newBodyColors:remove() bodyColors.Parent = player script:remove()

local humanoid = script.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid == nil then return end local health = humanoid.Health
while true do if humanoid.Health < health then humanoid:TakeDamage(-10) if humanoid.Health > health then humanoid.Health = health end end wait() end
